borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">sDNA / 347 / 100 -&nbsp;Location Plan - 17.01.23</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">sDNA / 347 / 101 rev A&nbsp;-&nbsp;Site Plan - 29.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">sDNA / 347 / 110&nbsp;rev B&nbsp;-&nbsp;Elevations: Block A&nbsp;- 29.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">sDNA / 347 / 111 rev B&nbsp;-&nbsp;Elevations: Block B - 29.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">sDNA / 347 / 112&nbsp;rev B&nbsp;-&nbsp;Elevations: Block C&nbsp;- 29.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">sDNA / 347 / 113&nbsp;rev B&nbsp;-&nbsp;Elevations: Block DEF&nbsp;- 29.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">sDNA / 347 / 114&nbsp;rev B&nbsp;-&nbsp;Elevations: Block G&nbsp;- 29.06.21</span></span></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Replacement of timber cladding and timber balcony decks with non-combustible material.

constraints_details.result: Gascoigne
